meanings.sent1: The overhigh tree towered above all the others in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The mountain's overhigh peak was covered in snow.
meanings.sent3: The overhigh shelf made it impossible for the short cat to reach its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: Her expectations were overhigh, leading to disappointment when reality fell short.
meanings.sent5: The overhigh fence seemed to touch the sky, creating a barrier between the two yards.

meanings.definition: Elevated to a level beyond what is considered normal or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: The overhigh price of the designer bag made it unaffordable for most people.
meanings.sent2: His overhigh ambitions led him to take on more than he could handle.
meanings.sent3: The overhigh heels she wore made her tower over everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The overhigh expectations set by the coach put a lot of pressure on the team.
meanings.sent5: The overhigh praise he received for his work boosted his confidence.
